item.description:
Hello folks!

Who am I?

I hold a (bacherlor’s) degree and a master’s degree in Computer Science. I felt interest and eagerness for technological issues from a very young age, and my passion for computers (soon) became my ambition. Ever since, I have (always) had a clear passion for security and user privacy , and this devotion is the main reason that made me enroll in a PhD program in these areas of expertise.

(I would say that) My capabilities are dynamic, as I have a high adaption capacity to work in different environments whilst performing at a high productivity rate. Moreover, I believe I am more than capable to take decisions without hesitation to bring projects to a successful conclusion.

Finally, I have experience both doing teamwork and working independently. I always give the best of myself in what/everything I do.

Education

  • PHD STUDENT DIGITAL IDENTITY, PRIVACY & IOT, University of Murcia (CURRENTLY)
  • MASTER IN NEW TECHNOLOGIES, University of Murcia (2017)
  • DEGREE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE, University of Murcia (2015)

What about my experience?

  • Pre-doctoral security & privacy researcher, University of Murcia, CURRENT
  • Pre-doctoral security & privacy researcher, IBM Zürich, 2018
  • iOS Developer, Leverade, 2014-2017
  • Intern, Department of Information and Communications Engineering, University of Murcia, 2013-14
  • Intern, Department of Information and Communications Engineering, University of Murcia, 2011-12
  • Systems administrator, Cieza (Murcia) City council, 2009
